00024 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Interceptor_RemoveXSS extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractInterceptor {
00025 
00033         public function process($gp,$settings) {
00034 
00035                 return $this->sanitizeValues($gp);
00036         }
00037 
00044         public function sanitizeValues($values) {
00045 
00046                 if(!is_array($values)) {
00047                         return array();
00048                 }
00049 
00050                 //if removeXSS is part of the core API
00051                 if (method_exists('t3lib_div','removeXSS')) {
00052                         foreach ($values as $key => $value) {
00053                                 if(is_array($value)) {
00054                                         $sanitizedArray[$key] = $this->sanitizeValues($value);
00055                                 } else {
00056                                         $value = str_replace("\t","",$value);
00057                                         $sanitizedArray[$key] = t3lib_div::removeXSS($value);
00058                                 }
00059                         }
00060                                 
00061                 //use the class provided by MailformPlusPlus
00062                 } else {
00063                         require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('mailformplusplus')."Resources/PHP/RemoveXSS.php");
00064                         foreach ($values as $key => $value) {
00065                                 if(is_array($value)) {
00066                                         $sanitizedArray[$key] = $this->sanitizeValues($value);
00067                                 } else {
00068                                         $value = str_replace("\t","",$value);
00069                                         $sanitizedArray[$key] = RemoveXSS::doRemoveXSS($value);
00070                                                 
00071                                 }
00072                         }
00073                 }
00074                 return $sanitizedArray;
00075         }
00076 
00077 }
00078 ?>
